title: Catherine Russell has starred in the same off-Broadway play for 37 years,...
content:
Catherine Russell has starred in the same off-Broadway play for 37 years, runs the theater it plays in, teaches six days a week, manages a restaurant, and even works the box office one day a week. Iâ€™m tired just writing all that!
